title: CREAMY BRUSSELS SPROUTS BAKE RECIPE
directions: In a small bowl, beat cream cheese and sour cream until smooth; set aside. In a large skillet, saute mushrooms and onion in butter until tender. Stir in brussels sprouts. Remove from the heat; stir in cream cheese mixture.

Spoon into a greased shallow 2-qt. baking dish. Cover and bake at 350Â° for 25-30 minutes or until bubbly. Uncover; sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Bake 5 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Yield: 6-8 servings.
ingredients: 2 packages (10 ounces each) frozen brussels sprouts, thawed and drained
